info.name: Dwarf (2024)
info.description: Dwarf species from the 2024 Player's Handbook for Aurora Builder (no Ability Score Increases from species).
info.author: Aurora Builder
Wizards of the Coast

description.p: Tenacious, loyal, and tempered by stone: dwarves embody the resilience of the mountains.
Dwarven Resilience. You have advantage on saving throws against poison and resistance to poison damage.
Dwarven Toughness. Your Hit Point maximum increases by 1, and it increases by 1 again whenever you gain a level.
Stonecunning. You have innate familiarity with stone and masonry; the DM can provide you additional details when you examine stone structures (flavor trait; no fixed numeric bonus in this version).
You have advantage on saving throws against poison and resistance to poison damage.

sheet.description: You have advantage on Saving Throw aginst Poison and resistence to poison damage

description.p: Your starting Hit Points increase by 1. Each time you gain a level, you gain 1 additional Hit Point.

As a Bonus Action, you gain Tremorsense with a range of 60 feet for 10 minutes. You must be on a stone surface or touching a stone surface to use this Tremorsense. The stone can be natural or worked. You can use this Bonus Action a number of times equal to your Proficiency Bonus, and you regain all expended uses when you finish a Long Rest.

sheet.description: You gain Tremorsense with a range of 60 ft. for 10 minutes. You must touch or stand on a stone surface to use this sense
